Class LogsReplicationServerMXBeanImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender, LogsReplicationServerMXBean, NotificationBroadcaster, NotificationEmitter

extends NotificationBroadcasterSupport
implements LogsReplicationServerMXBean, DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender

      • getDirectorySnapshot

        public List<FileInfo> getDirectorySnapshot(String directory,
                                           boolean triggerDirectoryWatch)
        Description copied from interface: LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Retrieve a directory snapshot.
        Specified by:
        getDirectorySnapshot in interface LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Parameters:
        directory - The snapshot is retrieved from this directory.
        triggerDirectoryWatch - If true then watching of the directory for changes is initiated or maintained if its already initiated. If false then a directory snapshot is retrieved with no side effect on directory watching.
        Returns:
        The directory snapshot as a list of FileInfo objects.

      • pushData

        public void pushData(String directoryPath,
                     String fileName,
                     long offset,
                     String connectionAddress,
                     int connectionPort,
                     int connectionToken)
        Description copied from interface: LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Request data to be pushed to the client.
        Specified by:
        pushData in interface LogsReplicationServerMXBean
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - The path to the file.
        fileName - The filename containing the data to be sent to the client.
        offset - The offset within the file to send to the client.
        connectionAddress - The address of the client.
        connectionPort - The connection of the client.
        connectionToken - A token placed in the stream to be sent to the client.

      • sendSnapshotNotification

        public void sendSnapshotNotification(List<FileInfo> snapshot,
                                     Path path)
                              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender
        Retrieve a directory snapshot notification and send it.
        Specified by:
        sendSnapshotNotification in interface DirectorySnapshotNotificationSender
        Parameters:
        snapshot - This is the snapshot associated with the notification if available. If it is null then a snapshot will be generated for the notification.
        path - A snapshot is retrieved for this path.
        Throws:
        IOException - An IOException has occurred.
